A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Had to think about this one. I left the theater feeling upset but unable to articulate exactly why. Upon reflection\, it comes to this: However much I might disagree with the way the film went\, it would have been OK if it had been well-worn\, but it is not. Well-known characters act radically different than they should\, potholes abound\, and payoffs from the previous film are dropped. Because of the doors Ep8 closed\, I don't care enough about what remains to want to see Ep9.
